TopicTitle: Does anyone know how to use signatures?

Articles.Content:
Exactly as the title.

I would really like using signatures as it's a cool way to link back to other threads and projects that you made. However, I can't seem to find a button in order to do so and make my signature show up. 

Is there a way to make a signature, and if so, how?

Thank you for your time

Edited October 24, 2023 by Great Liao
Fleshing out post

Click your name in the upper right, then Account Settings, then in the bottom of the list on the left side of the screen "Signature"

It edits just like a post would, though the forum limits the vertical size. Preview it before you commit to make sure you don't go over that size, which will make your signature look dumb.

(Source: I did it and my signature looked dumb)
I remembered that you used to be able to scroll down on signatures. What happened to that feature?
I assume it encouraged long signatures so was removed
